TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击 上的面板时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when the user clicks a panel on the . 指定所单击的 、按下的鼠标按钮、按下的次数以及单击 时鼠标单击的坐标。A specifies which was clicked, the mouse button that was pressed, how many times it was pressed, and the coordinates of the mouse click at the time the was clicked. 您可以使用此类在 事件的事件处理程序中提供的数据执行与被单击 相关的任务。You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the event to perform tasks related to the being clicked. 例如，如果使用 显示时间，则可以为 事件创建事件处理程序，并使用此类提供的数据显示一个对话框，该对话框允许您修改系统上的日期和时间。For example, if a is used to display the time, you could create an event handler for the event and use data provided by this class to display a dialog box that allows you to modify the date and time on the system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `StatusBar1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `StatusBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 属性可获取单击的 。The property enables you to obtain the that was clicked. 可以在 控件的 事件的事件处理程序中使用此函数来执行任务，例如在单击 控件中的 时显示自定义对话框。You can use this within the event handler for the event of a control to perform tasks such as displaying custom dialog boxes when a within a control is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `StatusBar1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `StatusBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
